Safety: Additional Comments: SW received a call from York County CYS Caseaid Marcia Forbes (717-683-3715). Marcia reports that supervised visit with parents has been confirmed for today at 10am but she is running approximately an hour behind. SW explained that if parents arrive prior to Marcia, they will not be permitted to present bedside until she arrives. Marcia verbalized understanding. SW provided contact number for Marcia to call if she has any difficulties locating patient's unit. Around 12:40pm, SW met Marcia and parents in main lobby and escorted them to patient's bedside due to difficulties navigating the hospital. SW also received a call from CYS worker Ashley Althoff (717-309-5324) who reports that a foster family has been identified in Lancaster County.
